row_sql: queen_id IN (SELECT queen_id FROM queens GROUP BY queen_id HAVING SUM(win) = 1)
queen_id IN (SELECT queen_id FROM queens GROUP BY queen_id HAVING SUM(win) > 0)
queen_id IN (SELECT queen_id FROM queens GROUP BY queen_id HAVING SUM(win) >= 2)
col_sql: queen_id IN (SELECT queen_id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 5)
queen_id IN (SELECT queen_id FROM queens GROUP BY queen_id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 3)
queen_id IN (SELECT queen_id FROM queens GROUP BY queen_id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 2)
row_desc: Queen has one mini challenge win.
Queen has at least one mini challenge win.
Queen has at least two mini challenge wins.
col_desc: Queen has three lip sync wins.
Queen has at least two lip sync wins.
